name: Hidizs AP80 Pro Max
curatorNote: One device. Multiple listening styles. Hi-Res sound, anywhere, anytime.
description: The Hidizs AP80 Pro Max is a powerful all-in-one high-resolution music player featuring dual ES9219C DAC chips, 2.5mm balanced output, and support for Tidal and Qobuz streaming. Designed for audiophiles who demand premium sound quality in a portable package.

specs.Supports: WiFi streaming from Tidal & Qobuz, microSD playback up to 512GB

specs.DAC Chips: Dual ES9219C DAC chips, +120dB SNR, +122dB DNR

specs.Body: CNC aluminum alloy with tempered glass panels

whyChoseThis: A perfect blend of design and performance — a premium pocket-sized player with audiophile-grade output and streaming support.

reviews.name: Sarah M.
reviews.comment: The AP80 Pro Max is incredible. I’ve never heard this level of detail from such a small device!

reviews.name: Mike M.
reviews.comment: Great DAC performance and build quality, though battery life could be longer.
